San_Marcos.KPRZ: KPRZ (1210 AM) is owned and operated by Salem Communications and offers Christian talk such as David Jeremiah and Christian music on Saturday nights for the San Diego market. It is licensed to San Marcos-Poway, California. The three broadcast antennas are near the San Elijo area in the city, which recently became a boomtown in the 2000s and the towers are surrounded by homes.
